name: Sling Hockey
description:
Sling Hockey is a fast paced game where you have to clear your side of the board as fast a possible but watch out as your opponent clears their side you have to work harder. 

Battle your friends and family (or AI) to see who is the Sling Hockey champion. 

Choose from a number of skins each with their own style of movement. 

New unlockables all the time.
